mapper.select: select id, total_num, total_money, pre_money, post_fee, pay_money, pay_type, create_time, update_time, pay_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, username, buyer_message, buyer_rate, receiver_contact, receiver_mobile, receiver_address, source_type, transaction_id, order_status, pay_status, consign_status, is_delete from tb_order where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_order(total_num, total_money, pre_money, post_fee, pay_money, pay_type, create_time, update_time, pay_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, username, buyer_message, buyer_rate, receiver_contact, receiver_mobile, receiver_address, source_type, transaction_id, order_status, pay_status, consign_status, is_delete) values (#{totalNum}, #{totalMoney}, #{preMoney}, #{postFee}, #{payMoney}, #{payType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{payTime}, #{consignTime}, #{endTime}, #{closeTime}, #{shippingName}, #{shippingCode}, #{username}, #{buyerMessage}, #{buyerRate}, #{receiverContact}, #{receiverMobile}, #{receiverAddress}, #{sourceType}, #{transactionId}, #{orderStatus}, #{payStatus}, #{consignStatus}, #{isDelete})

insert into tb_order(total_num, total_money, pre_money, post_fee, pay_money, pay_type, create_time, update_time, pay_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, username, buyer_message, buyer_rate, receiver_contact, receiver_mobile, receiver_address, source_type, transaction_id, order_status, pay_status, consign_status, is_delete) values
(#{entity.totalNum}, #{entity.totalMoney}, #{entity.preMoney}, #{entity.postFee}, #{entity.payMoney}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.payTime}, #{entity.consignTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.closeTime}, #{entity.shippingName}, #{entity.shippingCode}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.buyerMessage}, #{entity.buyerRate}, #{entity.receiverContact}, #{entity.receiverMobile}, #{entity.receiverAddress}, #{entity.sourceType}, #{entity.transactionId}, #{entity.orderStatus}, #{entity.payStatus}, #{entity.consignStatus}, #{entity.isDelete})

(#{entity.totalNum}, #{entity.totalMoney}, #{entity.preMoney}, #{entity.postFee}, #{entity.payMoney}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.payTime}, #{entity.consignTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.closeTime}, #{entity.shippingName}, #{entity.shippingCode}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.buyerMessage}, #{entity.buyerRate}, #{entity.receiverContact}, #{entity.receiverMobile}, #{entity.receiverAddress}, #{entity.sourceType}, #{entity.transactionId}, #{entity.orderStatus}, #{entity.payStatus}, #{entity.consignStatus}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update total_num = values(total_num), total_money = values(total_money), pre_money = values(pre_money), post_fee = values(post_fee), pay_money = values(pay_money), pay_type = values(pay_type), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), pay_time = values(pay_time), consign_time = values(consign_time), end_time = values(end_time), close_time = values(close_time), shipping_name = values(shipping_name), shipping_code = values(shipping_code), username = values(username), buyer_message = values(buyer_message), buyer_rate = values(buyer_rate), receiver_contact = values(receiver_contact), receiver_mobile = values(receiver_mobile), receiver_address = values(receiver_address), source_type = values(source_type), transaction_id = values(transaction_id), order_status = values(order_status), pay_status = values(pay_status), consign_status = values(consign_status), is_delete = values(is_delete)
mapper.update:
update tb_order
total_num = #{totalNum},
total_money = #{totalMoney},
pre_money = #{preMoney},
post_fee = #{postFee},
pay_money = #{payMoney},
pay_type = #{payType},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
pay_time = #{payTime},
consign_time = #{consignTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
close_time = #{closeTime},
shipping_name = #{shippingName},
shipping_code = #{shippingCode},
username = #{username},
buyer_message = #{buyerMessage},
buyer_rate = #{buyerRate},
receiver_contact = #{receiverContact},
receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile},
receiver_address = #{receiverAddress},
source_type = #{sourceType},
transaction_id = #{transactionId},
order_status = #{orderStatus},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
consign_status = #{consignStatus},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
